release_notes:
• Bump Android minSdk to 23 for Firebase Auth 5.x
• Add Firebase web configuration to fix blank page
• Fix Firebase deploy - properly check if secret exists
• Make Firebase Hosting deploy non-blocking
• Fix web build - upgrade Firebase packages for Flutter 3.27
• Add Firebase Hosting for web deployment
• Fix TextDirection import - use ui.TextDirection.ltr
• Add YTD, All Time, and per-year period selectors to Investment Performance
• Add Investment Performance chart (gains only, excludes deposits)
• Fix double-counting of deposits in account balance
